information.KeepYourPasswordsSafe: Store all your passwords, data or any otherinformation here, forget about paper notes and unprotected applications
information.SafeBepositBox: Create your master key: only you will be able to access your secrets with it
information.descriptionHowItWorks: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to retrieve your password, so remember it well
information.descriptionDataSave: For example, your card number, mobile phone PIN and PUK, the serial number of one of your devices or any other information you need to keep safe.
information.terms: Being of legal age, I consent to the processing of my data. OPENBANK S. L. will process my data for the purpose of using it to manage my financial interests. You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, deletion, portability, limitation and opposition, as we inform you in our Privacy Policy and Legal Notice.

form.descriptionPasswordManager: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to retrieve your password, so remember it well.
form.confirmPassword: Confirm the password to let you continue with the process.
form.commentClue: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
form.titleClues: Create your clue to remember your password (optional)

feedback.titlesSuccess: Your Password Manager is now created!
feedback.textDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
feedback.textError: We were unable to change your master password. Please try again later.

access.textDescription: The process is finished and you can return to the information page.
